name: NIZATIDINE
cautions:
Cautions see notes above; also avoid rapid intravenous
injection (risk of arrhythmias and postural hypotension); interactions: Appendix 1 (histamine H2-antagonists) and notes above
side-effects: Side-effects see notes above; also sweating; rarely nausea, fever, vasculitis, hyperuricaemia
doses:
Benign gastric, duodenal or NSAID-associated ulceration,
treatment, 300 mg in the evening or 150 mg twice
daily for 4–8 weeks; maintenance, 150 mg at night

Gastro-oesophageal reflux disease, 150–300 mg twice daily for
up to 12 weeks
pregnancy: Pregnancy manufacturer advises avoid unless essential
